title: HCL Tech net profit surges to Rs 3,593 crore in Q4 - Times of India
content: HCL Tech net profit surges to Rs 3,593 crore in Q4  Times of India
description: India Business News:  IT services company HCL Technologies on Thursday saw its net profit zoom to Rs 3,593 crore for quarter ended March 2022, and struck an optimistic not
